com.sorcix.sirc

Class Channel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sorcix.sirc.Channel

  • public final class Channel
extends Object
    Represents a channel on the IRC server.
    Author:
    Sorcix

    • Constructor Detail

      • Channel

        protected Channel(String name,
       IrcConnection irc,
       boolean global)
        Creates a new Channel object with given name.
        Parameters:
        name - The channel name.
        irc - The IrcConnection used to send messages to this channel.
        global - Whether this object is going to be shared.

    • Method Detail

      • addUser

        protected void addUser(User user)
        Adds a user to the user list in this channel.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to add.

      • ban

        public void ban(User user,
       boolean kick)
        Bans a user from this channel.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to ban from this channel.
        kick - Whether to kick this user after banning.

      • changeTopic

        public void changeTopic(String topic)
        Changes the topic of this channel. Note that you need privileges to do this.
        Parameters:
        topic - The new topic.

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Returns the channel name.
        Returns:
        The channel name.

      • getTopic

        public String getTopic()
        Gives the topic of this channel, or null if unknown.
        Returns:
        The topic.

      • getUser

        protected User getUser(String nickLower)
        Retrieves a global User object for a user in this channel. This method is not public because end-users should use IrcConnection.createUser(String, String) which always returns a User, even if the user is not in this channel.
        Parameters:
        nickLower - The nickname of this user.
        Returns:
        A user object, or null if the user isn't in this channel.

      • getUs

        public User getUs()

      • getUsers

        public Iterator<User> getUsers()
        Get an Iterator containing all users in this channel. 
         Iterator<User> users = channel.getUsers();
 User current;
 while (users.hasNext()) {
        current = users.next();
        System.out.println(current.getNick() + " is in this channel!");
 }
        Returns:
        All users in this channel.
        See Also:
        isGlobal()

      • giveAdmin

        public void giveAdmin(User user)
        Give a user admin privileges in this channel. (Not supported by RFC!)
        Parameters:
        user - The user to give admin privileges.
        Since:
        1.0.0

        Parameters:

        Since:

        public boolean hasUser(String nick)
        Checks whether given user is in this channel.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • hasUser

        public boolean hasUser(User user)
        Checks whether given user is in this channel.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to check.
        Returns:
        True if given user is in this channel, false otherwise.

      • isGlobal

        public boolean isGlobal()
        Checks whether this Channel object is shared. Shared channel objects contain a list of users.
        Returns:
        True if this channel object is shared.

      • join

        public void join()
        Attempts to join this channel.

        public void join(String password)
        Attempts to join this channel using given password.
        Parameters:
        password - The password needed to join this channel.

        Kicks given user from this channel.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to kick from this channel.

        String reason)
        Kicks given user from this channel, with reason.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to kick from this channel.
        reason - The reason why this user was kicked.

      • sendCtcp

        public void sendCtcp(String command)
        Sends CTCP request. This is a very primitive way to send CTCP commands, other methods are preferred.
        Parameters:
        command - Command to send.

      • sendCtcpAction

        Sends a CTCP ACTION command.

      • setMode

        public void setMode(char mode,
           User user,
           boolean toggle)
        Changes a channel mode for given user.
        Parameters:
        mode - The mode character.
        user - The target user.
        toggle - True to enable the mode, false to disable.

      • setMode

        public void setMode(String mode)
        Changes a channel mode. The channel name is automatically added. 
         setMode("+m");
        Parameters:
        mode - The mode to change.

      • setTopic

        protected void setTopic(String topic)
        Changes the topic of this channel. This does not send a request to the IRC server, to change the topic on the server, use changeTopic(String).
        Parameters:
        topic - The new topic.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

      • updateUser

        protected User updateUser(User user,
              boolean createNew)
        Updates the current shared User object with changes in a fresh one and returns the updated shared object.
        Parameters:
        user - The fresh User object.
        createNew - Whether to add this user to the channel if it didn't exist.
        Returns:
        The updated shared User object.
